sparse.eigenvolvers.java

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • sparse.eigenvolvers.java.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    SPARSE-EIG Java Utilities class.

    SPARSE-EIG uses the MTJ Java library (matrix-toolkits-java) and Netlib Java (netlib-java) for numerical linear algebra and matrix computations.

    The Utilities class consists of a set of useful methods for running and testing eigenvalue problems and implementing numerical linear algebra algorithms.

    Author:
    Rico Argentati

      • getLaplacian

        public static no.uib.cipr.matrix.sparse.CompRowMatrix getLaplacian(int... args)
        Returns 1D or 2D or 3D CompRowMatrix Laplacian matrix with simple Dirichlet boundary conditions. Used for testing purposes. See Matlab File - laplacian.m
        Parameters:
        nx -
        ny -
        ny - 
        Parameters:  
       getLaplacian(nx), OR  getLaplacian(nx,ny),  OR  getLaplacian(nx,ny,nz)
        Returns:
        CompRowMatrix

      • getLaplacianEigenvalues

        public static no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix getLaplacianEigenvalues(int count,
                                                     int... args)
        Returns count exact eigenvalues for 1D or 2D or 3D Laplacian matrix with simple Dirichlet boundary conditions. Used for testing purposes. See Matlab File - laplacian.m

        See Iterative Methods for Solving Linear Systems, Anne Greenbaum, SIAM 1997, p. 132 

        Parameters:  
 getLaplacian(count,nx), OR  getLaplacian(count,nx,ny),  OR  getLaplacian(count,nx,ny,nz)
        Returns:
        DenseMatrix count x 1

        public static int eig(no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix A,
      no.uib.cipr.matrix.DenseMatrix B,
      double[] eigValues)
        Method to solve a generalized eigenvalue problem A*x=lambda*B*x using LAPACK - DSYGV. A must be symmetric and B must be symmetric positive definite
        Parameters:
        A - DenseMatrix
        B - DenseMatrix
        eigValues - double array
